channel.title: Book Review on Incubyte Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Book Review on Incubyte Blog

item.title: Are you sabotaging your organizational goals?
item.description: I recently came across Simple Sabotage Field Manual. What struck me was you do not need bombs and explosives to start sabotaging.

item.title: Learnings From Clean Code
item.description: Learnings from Robert “Uncle Bob” Martin Robert Martin, fondly known as “Uncle Bob” in our community, is a software engineer and more famously an author and one of the founding fathers of Software Craftsmanship movement.
